approximation.translation[0].definitions: a number, amount etc that is not exact, but is almost correct
Could you give us a rough approximation of the cost?
something that is similar to another thing, but not exactly the same
It was the nearest approximation to a crisis sheâ€™d ever experienced.
approximation.translation[1].definitions: a number, amount etc that is not exact, but is intended to give an idea of the real number, amount etc
The figures are meant to be an approximation of the costs.
something that is similar to another thing but not exactly the same
